main_definition: The Netherlands, officially known as the Kingdom of the Netherlands, is a country located in Northwestern Europe with a rich history, cultural diversity, and economic significance.

meanings_and_examples.example: The Low Countries refer to the area that includes the Netherlands as well as Belgium and Luxembourg.
I am planning a trip to visit the beautiful landscapes of the Netherlands next summer.

meanings_and_examples.definition: An idiom used to describe something located low or at a lower level
meanings_and_examples.example: The factory is situated netherlands, near the ground floor of the building.
